item.title: Music Production
item.description: I use lmms to create music for games and personal use. My soundcloud is here

item.title: Modeling
item.description: I enjoy using blender to 3d model various objects and to make VFX. I also use blender to develop assets for game development. My blendswap profile is here

item.title: Programming
item.description: I am continually trying to improve my skills as a programmer, with the goal of being able to create and do anything I want as efficiently as possible with a computer. Most of my projects are either on my github or on my personal git server

item.title: Game Development
item.description: My primary engine of choice for game development is Godot, for a multitude of reasons. I have a club at La Jolla High School called Viking Games, where we develop games to earn money towards our ASB. All of my personal games can be seen here

item.title: Weekly Jam Fail
item.description: Synopsys Sadly, my project idea for week 52 proved to be too much work to be done by one person in the allotted time. Game idea Orinally the game was supposed to be like this: A deserty theme Main shop area with ~4 NPCS 3 bosses Combat top down, shooting style A shop where you could buy weapons But here’s all I was able to get done:

item.title: Weekly Game Jam Beginning
item.description: More info about the weekly game jam here Hello blog readers! Today marks the offical end of the first day in my participation in the Weekly Game Jam, a weekly competition where game developers from all around collectively develop on a theme for a small prize. The theme for this weeks game jam was Boss Rush When I saw this theme, nothing came to me at first. I even attempted at collaborating with somebody else, but our attempts at coming up with something different fell short.

item.title: Setting Up Website
item.description: Synopsis Using hugo to create a website is very easy, as shown in these steps I followed the hugo quick start guide And the introduction theme’s instructions Steps Installing hugo Because arch linux has a wide breadth of supported programs in it’s repos, I was able to simply run: sudo pacman -S hugo And use the hugo new site website command to create the website in a folder named website/

item.title: Contact
item.description: I respond to email within two days

item.title: About
item.description: I am a programmer, 3d artist, musician, and game designer Lightning Round Qualifications Life scout Competent in C++, C, Golang, Godot, HTML/CSS/Javascript, Java, Vim Able to do 3D design and creation in blender Author of various games on itch.io Over sixty github projects Various musical projects on soundcloud
